hints.content:
The cowboys scored $\goldE{13}$ points at halftime.

![A number line starts at 13 extending to the right.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/ba74fc4d1d3edcfe60c862c78492bacf3afa400b)

To add on the number line, we jump to the **right**.

Then the Cowboys scored $\maroonD{14}$ points in the third quarter.

![A number line starts at 13 with plus 14 and goes to 27. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/9df842e3c7aab4ae1f206d60837701e26166a012)

$\goldE{13} + \maroonD{14} = 27$

The cowboys scored $\blueE{21}$ points in the fourth quarter.

![A number line starts at 13 with plus 14 and goes to 27. From 27 plus 21 goes to 48.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/6c98f8f45a19f32adf06a5f52d45251544da210b)

$27+  \blueE{21} = 48$

This number line represents how to find the total points the Cowboys scored:

![A number line starts at 13 with plus 14 and goes to 27. From 27 plus 21 goes to ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/0c9c364aa09c1bd5c773d8a2f2a09415f84c3f2c)

The Cowboys scored $48$ points.

question.content:
The Dallas Cowboys had $13$ points at halftime.

Then, the Cowboys scored $14$ more points in the third quarter and $21$ more points in the fourth quarter.  

**Which number line shows how to find how many total points the Cowboys scored in the game?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

**How many total points did the Cowboys score in the game?** 
 
[[☃ numeric-input 1]] points
